Thesaurus

dictionary <- c(run='walk fast or gallop', sleep='to not be awake. to dream', chair='object for sitting, the person who runs a meeting')
names(dictionary)
[1] "run"   "sleep" "chair"

roget <- function(word, definitions){
matched <- grep(word, definitions)
return(names(definitions)[matched])
}

roget("run", dictionary)
[1] "chair"

roget("awake", dictionary)
[1] "sleep"
